data.name: Escape the Dead
data.detailed_description:
Help restore the simulation!

You awake inside of a cave in Starnex Island with your handgun and double barrel shotgun, ready to shoot anything that gets in your way of escaping the island of Starnex.
The island of Starnex is under attack by an unknown force. This force has released four monsters into the world of Starnex. The force has brought it's own army to stop anyone that stands in its way. Defeat all four monsters to unlock the tunnel of death and escape this island.

Gear up!
-Find supplies and gold to unlock new weaponry like the gasonator, a flamethrower like weapon that spews out toxic gas at your enemies.

Become overpowered!
-Collect trinkets to improve your stats like movement speed and how much health you regenerate.

Power up!
-Grab boost power ups to become even more powerful.

Destroy your enemies!
-Destroy zombies, ghosts, gangster chickens, tacos, and much more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8700 CPU @ 3.20GHz 3.19 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game features violent shooting, comical chainsaw attacks, blood on the screen, and blood splatter coming from damaged monsters.
